title: some one get my password on lol and my email password and now i cant get on email and lol
body:
some idiot get into my acc and changed my email and lol password so now i cant get to anything of this  i need help please Now he is feeding on my acc and my nick is Ninzaaa


PLEASE HELP ME  WHAT I HAVE TO DO NOW

replies.body: Don't worry we can help!  Hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), and our account recovery team will help update your info and recover the account for you.  We can also look into offering repairs if they're possible.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can.
but they stole my  email and changed password too
